titlestmt.subtitle: Baltimore, Maryland, Letter Ms1991-007

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1991-007
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Letter written by "N.R.W." in Baltimore to Dr. Charles H. Moore in Louisiana on January 26, 1860, about his desire to secure a teacher's position in a Southern plantation household.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Baltimore, Maryland, Letter must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Baltimore, Maryland, Letter, Ms1991-007, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Baltimore, Maryland, Letter was acquired by Special Collections in prior to 1991.

altformavail.head: Alternate Form Available
altformavail.p: Images (gifs) of the letter are available on the Special Collections website. See the "Contents List" below for links to images.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Baltimore, Maryland, Letter commenced and was completed in 1991. Additional description was completed before 2008 and in 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Letter written by "N.R.W." in Baltimore to Dr. Charles H. Moore in Louisiana on January 26, 1860, about his desire to secure a teacher's position in a Southern plantation household.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
